Icon image originally by *Kolby Kirk*.


= How To Install Wave Dice Gadget =
 # Click on All, choose the Extension Gallery, scroll down to the bottom and install the "Extension Installer".
 # Back in your inbox, click the drop down on New Wave, and choose New Extension Installer.  
 # Paste in this url: http://wavedicegadget.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/manifest.xml
 # Hit Ok.  You're done!  You can now add a Dice Gadget to any wave just by clicking on the dice icon.
